summary: The module implements a training pipeline for the OGB Largeâ€‘Scale Challenge MAG240M dataset using DGL and PyTorch. It defines a collator to gather external node features, a relational graph attention network for heterogeneous graph representation learning, and placeholder train and test routines.
business_intent: Provide a scalable graph neural network solution for node classification on the massive MAG240M academic graph, showcasing how relational attention mechanisms can be applied to heterogeneous data in the OGB LSC benchmark.
